title: What If The Experts Are Wrong? (Ep 1220)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning failures by the experts to give us accurate information on the Coronavirus, and the disastrous decisions being made as a result of the bad data. I also address the media’s efforts to hide their constantly changing stories about the collusion hoax, and the Wuhan Virus. 

News Picks:

The Democrats aren’t even hiding their desire for more hoax investigations. 

So many businesses are struggling in this government enforced shutdown, but some have increased sales. 

Wait, what? A Virologist makes a stunning claim about the Wuhan Virus. 


5 keys to unlocking the shady relationship between the WHO and China. 


What is the cause of the unprecedented stock market drop in response to the Wuhan Virus?


More evidence emerges that the Bob Mueller investigation was a complete scam.
